title: Game Music Collection
description: Game Music Collection for many kinds of projects, RPG, Casual, Futuristic,  Racing, Urban themes.
longDescription:
This bundle is the discounted version of the total price of all individual packages within it, and it also includes exclusive songs belonging to the bundle.


The Intersonic Game Music Bundle includes 200 unique pieces of music in various genres, including Epic-Dark Medieval Fantasy, Electronic-EDM, Hybrid, Ambient, and Heavy Metal. These tracks are perfect for game developers looking to enhance their game with high-quality, professional music. With a wide range of styles and moods to choose from, the Intersonic Game Music Bundle provides a comprehensive solution for game audio needs. The bundle is designed to be easily integrated into any game engine and to offer a flexible and cost-effective solution for game developers of all sizes.


/// We've updated our music collection, one of our bestsellers, free of charge for our existing users. Thank you for your interest!


Please PREVIEW some of the music in full.


As part of the update, we made adjustments that facilitate navigation and strengthen the content. Acting on the emails we received from you, we also ensured that the collection covers different UE versions. You can take a look at each of the changes made:


CHANGELOG


  • The update is free; you can access new download links again.
  • Collection volume increased from 150 to 200 by adding 50 unique music.
  • Actions taken to support UE 4.27, 5.0.3 and 5.1.0.
  • A few packages that we also sell individually have been added to the collection.
  • Different songs that we did not release have been added to the collection.
  • A comprehensive arrangement has been made to the folders in order to ensure ease of use.
  • The latest songs were composed as full and loop versions.
  • The total size is 7.03 GB.
  • The name of the product has been changed.
  • The images of the product have been changed.


CATEGORIES & CONTENT


The collection of 200 unique music consists of various categories:


  1. RPG Theme
  2. Futuristic Game Theme
  3. Casual Game Theme
  4. Urban Game Theme
  5. Racing Game Theme


Each category contains a wide range of music tracks with different moods and styles, suitable for various game genres and themes. Whether you're looking for background music, battle music, or theme music, the Intersonic Game Music Bundle has something for you. The tracks are high-quality and professionally composed, ensuring that your game audio is top-notch and sets the right mood for your players.


MUSIC BY GENRE


  • EDM: 48 Music
  • Hybrid: 18 Music
  • Orchestral: 40 Music
  • Metal-Rock: 32 Music
  • Trap Beats: 10 Music
  • Casual Funk: 14 Music
  • Ambient Drone: 32 Music
  • Synthetic-Melodic: 6 Music


The list of previous packs included in this collection:


  • Futuristic Music: Resonance
  • Dark Fantasy Music: The Apostate
  • Medieval Library: Elves
  • Racing Game Music
  • Metal Music Collection
  • Aggressive EDM Music Pack


SOME NOTES


  • Some of the old songs of the collection may be Loop only, and some may only be Full versions.
  • Products belonging to Aggressive EDM Music Pack (included in the "EDM Songs" folder in the collection) do not have BPM information.


Versions: UE 4.27, 5.0.3, 5.1.0

Total Unique Music: 200

Total Music: 226

Total Size: 7.03 GB

Total Length: 7 hours, 55 minutes

File Type: 24-bit WAV

Sample Rate: 44100

Mastered: Yes

Looping: Yes (for some songs “No”)

Usability: Well-structured folders
technicalDetails:
You can email us with new ideas and opinions, technical questions, corrections or inquiries, or even just to chat. Your feedback enhances the value of every product you purchase, and we consider it important.


FAQ


Can I use your products in my commercial projects without any restrictions?

Yes, absolutely! You can use them in all kinds of content, including films, games, or YouTube videos, even for commercial purposes.


Will there be a problem if I upload a video to YouTube that contains music from Intersonic Sound?

No, it won't. The products are not registered with Content ID and are structured to not claim rights. You will not receive a copystrike warning for your channel.


Do you update your products?

There are products that we have updated and will continue to update. We may not update all of them, but the likelihood of us adding new content to your purchased product as a free update is very high.


What file format do you use?

We prefer 24-bit WAV files. If the package size becomes too large, we might consider 16-bit WAV, but we have not done this yet. For now, we have processed every product as a 24-bit WAV.
